Title: Crash Site
ImagePrompt: A smoking escape pod on a red dusty plain with jagged rocks
Description: The air is thin and your oxygen levels are dropping. The pod is trashed.

Title: Ancient Ridge
ImagePrompt: A high rocky ridge overlooking a vast orange desert valley
Description: You see something metallic glinting in the distance to the East.

Title: Dusty Outpost
ImagePrompt: A small domed structure partially buried in sand
Description: The door is sealed tight. You need a way to bypass the keypad.

Title: The Red Canyon
ImagePrompt: A deep narrow canyon with steep red walls and strange shadows
Description: It's freezing here. You find a thermal blanket discarded by a previous traveler.

Title: Sulfur Pits
ImagePrompt: Yellow bubbling pits of acid emitting thick white steam
Description: The smell is overwhelming. You see a titanium scrap piece near the edge.
